numEndsForGame.name: num-ends-for-game
numEndsForGame.text: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ends WHERE game_id = $1

updateGameTeams.name: update-game-teams
updateGameTeams.text: UPDATE games SET top_team = $2, bottom_team = $3 WHERE id = $1

updateGameSubmission.name: update-game-submission
updateGameSubmission.text: UPDATE games SET date_submitted = $2, submitted_by = $3 WHERE id = $1
